## TournamentPlayer class

A representation of a player in a clash tournament.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TournamentPlayer 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [position](./shieldbow.tournamentplayer.position.md) |  | 'UNSELECTED' \| 'FILL' \| 'TOP' \| 'JUNGLE' \| 'MIDDLE' \| 'BOTTOM' \| 'UTILITY' | The position this player will be playing in the team. |
|  [role](./shieldbow.tournamentplayer.role.md) |  | 'CAPTAIN' \| 'MEMBER' | The role this player will be performing in the team - CAPTAIN or MEMBER. |
|  [summoner](./shieldbow.tournamentplayer.summoner.md) |  | Promise&lt;import("./Summoner").[Summoner](./shieldbow.summoner.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Use [SummonerManager.fetch()](./shieldbow.summonermanager.fetch.md) to fetch the summoner for this player. |
|  [summonerId](./shieldbow.tournamentplayer.summonerid.md) |  | string | The summoner ID of this player. |
|  [teamId](./shieldbow.tournamentplayer.teamid.md) |  | string | The ID of the team this player is on. |
